alert.note: Alert for Butte; Meade; Perkins (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 10 at 10:07PM MDT until July 10 at 10:30PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1030 PM MDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN BUTTE...CENTRAL MEADE AND SOUTHWESTERN PERKINS COUNTIES... At 1007 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 5 miles south of Maurine to 5 miles north of Hereford, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Union Center, Enning, Fairpoint, Marcus, Maurine, White Owl, Stoneville, Opal, Red Owl and Mud Butte. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move to a shelter, inside a strong building and away from windows.
